name: The Future of Web3 Music Industry
description: The music industry is broken and corrupted. Let's Learn from industry leaders about the current state of the music industry and get a glimpse into its future. This panel will explore opportunities and challenges presented by decentralization and how it will disrupt the global music ecosystem.

speakers.name: XTincT
speakers.bio: On-Chain Recording artist and creative director

speakers.name: Bai-ee
speakers.bio: Founder of EditTrax NFT & Housepit CHI Records. Chicago House Dj, Producer and Creative Technologist
